Chapter 19

Translator: Mosstree


Chapter 19: Overbearing Younger Brother Fell in Love with Me?!


In the school’s BBS, the latest high-energy topic related to “cohabitation” had picture proof, and was soon covered in posts.


1st post: This original poster saw it with his own eyes, Wei Han and Qi Zhifan actually went home together?! Below are pictures. (The pictures were of two people taking the bus together and going into the same building in a neighborhood district.)


2nd post: Fuck! They have the rhythm of cohabitation?


3rd post: Then it couldn’t be that they’ve already seen their parents, and came out of the closet?


4th post: The two also started cohabiting when they’re still in school. Is it possible that they have a childhood friendship, and pledged to be married from when they were little? No, this really pokes my meng point ah!


5th post: Hahaha, before I stood firmly in the true love association ah, now I’m prepared to whip together some money.


6th post: Poster above, count me in. I’m looking forward to their wedding!


7th post: It so happens that in my next article, I will write about their married life. By the way, they’ll adopt a boy and a girl, and the whole family will be joyous and harmonious.


8th post: I’m worthless with words, but I will try to draw it.


……


When Wei Han clicked into it, his face turned pale after seeing it, and simply felt as if his head would explode. He couldn’t take it anymore, feeling that he simply couldn’t block the pit in their brain.


“Qi Zhifan, you didn’t find recently in the school, that uh, there’s a bit of trouble?”


Back home, Wei Han mumbled, really wanting to ask Qi Zhifan to deal with this rotten-hearted scandal.


He himself had already explained countless times and exhausted his speech, but everyone had always been skeptical. If Qi Zhifan could also come forward to clarify, then maybe it’d be fine.


“You want me to help you?”


Qi Zhifan slightly raised his eyebrows. He also saw that Wei Han always had a crying face these past few days, and still intentionally avoided him.


Wei Han nodded, his face suddenly smiling, “Uh-huh, you’re the study god and the vice president, and also S Uni’s shareholder, help me out a little bit. I can make things for you to eat. You can choose whatever you want to eat.”


“No, it feels so troublesome,” Qi Zhifan said lazily, directly patted his butt and left.


Wei Han: “……”


Ahh? Was food temptation useless? The flame of hope was suddenly extinguished.


But strange to say, how come Qi Zhifan didn’t care at all, like it had nothing to do with him? At present, the administrator in the BBS seemed to have vanished and hadn’t deleted those posts at all. Was Qi Zhifan unaware of this matter?


Ai, probably Qi Zhifan was holding several positions and usually very busy, so temporarily was too lazy to manage the gossip about himself.


In the dessert shop, these days were very unusual. In addition to classes, Wei Han stayed here almost all of the time. In the evening, he also ate his dinner before returning home. He wanted to get through this period of time first, and when everyone finds out that there was nothing between Qi Zhifan and him, or a new topic turns up, then the scandal crisis would settle and naturally be forgotten.


The store manager, Song Bohao, was a bit unable to understand. Why did Wei Han, who was still a student, insist on working the night shift? Jiang Chengrui was well aware of what was going on and patted Wei Han’s shoulder, expressing his deep sympathy.


Because Wei Home came home late, so Mother Wei had to cook. This also led to a significant drop in the quality of Qi Zhifan and Dad Qi’s meals. It could be said that heaven and earth, the gap was too great.


So, Qi Zhifan came to the dessert shop where Wei Han worked.


There were some S Uni students in the shop. The sudden appearance of Male God Qi caught their attention, and especially the girls in Wei Han’s class were even more excited. They knew that Wei Han worked here. Now that Qi Zhifan had also come, wasn’t this specially coming to see his sweetheart?


For Qi Zhifan to suddenly visit, but also specially request Wei Han’s service, he simply scared Wei Han out of his wits. He hid in the back kitchen and simply didn’t dare to come out.


Song Bohao was a bit unclear on what was going on. Jiang Chengrui saw that for Wei Han to keep hiding wasn’t a solution, and he wanted to help him come up with a plan.


“Wei Han, yours and Qi Zhifan’s scandal, does he know about it?”


Wei Han with a bitter expression, shook his head. “He probably doesn’t know. He’s constantly involved in scandals previously, and it’s estimated he’s also too lazy to manage it.”


“Then why don’t you just tell him?” Jiang Chengrui asked again.


“I…I can’t say it,” Wei Han said, embarrassed.


Did he want him to personally say to Qi Zhifan that they were mistaken as a couple, and that this older brother was also the shou being pressed underneath!


Usually, Wei Han’s face wasn’t so thin, but when the other was Qi Zhifan, he was a little unable to let go of his face.


“Then why don’t I say it for you? Anyway, Qi Zhifan is waiting outside.” Jiang Chengrui rolled his eyes.


Wei Han quickly stopped him. “No…don’t, Little Jiang, I don’t want to bother you. I have to make it clear to Qi Zhifan myself.”


“Yeah, that’s right. You have to let everyone know that you are his older brother and nothing more.”


So, Wei Han carried the plate of food, hesitated, and eventually came before Qi Zhifan.


Legs tilted, Qi Zhifan, who had been waiting for half a day, looked up. “How is it so slow? You can really dawdle inside.”


Wei Han’s lips twitched, didn’t speak, and put the cake tray down and also gave him ice cream. When walking, Wei Han only felt as if there were tips of blades on his back as countless pairs of eyes stared at his every move.


Adam’s apple moving, Wei Han’s voice tore out, “Qi Zhifan, I’m your brother, right?”


The words were astonishing. The crowd of students were suddenly stunned silly.


Qi Zhifan also stopped moving his hand and looked at Wei Han with a ruminating face: “…What, do you want put on your older brother’s airs to pressure me?”


“Pressure what ah! Very busy person, trouble you in your spare time, to go look at the BBS to see what our relationship has become. Good, Bye!” Wei Han shouted, with the last two words especially forcefully bitten out.


Looking at Wei Han’s back, the corners of Qi Zhifan’s lips raised in an imperceptible arc…


This matter, he’d just known a few days ago. Previously seeing Wei Han’s distressed appearance, he’d asked around a little and realized that they’d been turned into a scandal. Strangely, Qi Zhifan wasn’t angry this time. Instead, he was looking forward to how Wei Han would resolve it.


Within his expectations, Wei Han couldn’t stand it, and still blurted out their real relationship in front of him.


Afterwards, the “brothers” relationship between Wei Han and Qi Zhifan was made known to everyone in S Uni.


However, because Wei Han and Qi Zhifan had no blood relationship, some rotten sisters opened wide their brain pit. After confirming the brother setup, they followed the crowd, and a big pile of brothers text appearedー


Something like “Overbearing Younger Brother Fell in Love with Me,” “Outrageous Younger Brother Don’t Provoke Me,” and “High Society Young Master’s Private Pet Brother,” “Loving Older Brother Excessively,” as well as “Black-Bellied Younger Brother’s Pit the Brother Plan,” “Master Qi’s Only Pampered Meng Brother” …


Seeing this, Wei Han almost sprayed a mouthful of blood on the phone screen!


Fuck, why did it changed to brotherly taboo love, and most of them were president style text ah! Fuck, in the end, this group of people had no lower limit ah!


Wei Han shed tears of remorse in his heart: at that time, it would have been better to not explain. This time, it only made matters worse. How come it seemed inevitable that Odd Trouble and he would be involved together.


On the weekend, Pei Yuyang went to play tennis with Qi Zhifan. After playing for a while, Qi Zhifan felt bored and sat down to rest.


If it was before, Pei Yuyang would surely cling to Qi Zhifan to accompany him for a few more sets. But since knowing Qi Zhifan had low blood sugar, he didn’t dare to let him get tired and also let him go.


After finding other people to accompany him, Pei Yuyang got bored because the other side’s skills weren’t great. So he also retired from the court and walked over to Qi Zhifan’s side.


Qi Zhifan had always been staring at his phone, looking at something with great interest.


Pei Yuyang was somewhat curious. As far as he knew, under normal circumstances, Qi Zhifan usually read financial and business books, and also detective murder mysteries. However, he read books in hard copy. Because he was proficient in multiple languages, so he basically didn’t have to read the original work through a translator, and very rarely viewed e-books on his phone.


Pei Yuyang took a closer look and was shocked when he glimpsed the words “Overbearing Younger Brother Fell in Love with Me” at the top of the screen…


“Ah Fan, you…you’re actually looking at this again…You listen to my advice ah, these type of novels, the more you read, the more likely it’d affect your IQ.”


“……” Qi Zhifan gave him a glare and turned to go elsewhere.


Pei Yuyang quickly chased after him and said, “Good Ah Fan, don’t you believe it? I’m really sincere. When your IQ drops, don’t blame me for not reminding you.”


“You’re noisy. Don’t bother me.” The first time Qi Zhifan came into contact with this type of novel, he’d expressed great interest and needed to do some research.


Pei Yuyang: “……”


What should he do? Did Ah Fan take the wrong medicine today?


The scandal had persisted until summer vacation and couldn’t be stopped.


Wei Han saw that Qi Zhifan seemed to not want to say anything at all and also took pleasure in it. He had an attitude of watching a joke, and Wei Han knew he couldn’t be counted on. He believed that by the next semester, things should be better.


In the next semester with Chu Chuanyao’s arrival, everyone would have a new focus and this matter would truly pass.


Today was first day to report to school. At the entrance of S Uni, Wei Han was welcoming the new students.


Last night he had a sleepless night, so Wei Han had been waiting from early on. The timeーone minute, one secondーpassed. His heart became more and more worried: he’d soon see Chu Chuanyao, his “Little Yao” ah!


Suddenly, his cell phone rang and Wei Han connected: “Hey mom, why did you call?”


“Han-han, you…quickly come! Fan-fan, he…he was hit by a car!” Mother Wei said anxiously, almost crying.


“What! Which hospital is he in? I’ll be right there.”


Afterwards, Mother Wei informed him of the hospital address, and Wei Han hurriedly took a car and went straight to the destination. After getting in the car, he looked back at the school gate. Perhaps he wouldn’t see Chu Chuanyao today, but he’d been waiting for so long, waiting for another day was nothing…


At the hospital when Wei Han arrived, he saw that the operating room light was still on and the anxiety in his heart suddenly intensified.


“Mom, Qi Zhifan, he…” Dad Qi calmly leaned against the wall, and Wei Han directly went in front of Mother Wei. His question had not finished yet, when Mother Wei’s tears flowed down her cheeks.


Her voice also shaking: “Han-han, Fan-fan, he…his head here…had a lot of blood, right now he’s…being saved.”


Wei Han’s heart “ba-dump” a sound. Although his face was also white, he still patted Mother Wei’s back and whispered, “Mom, don’t worry, I believe Qi Zhifan will be fine.”


“I’m sorry, it’s because he saved me.”


Suddenly, there was the sound of a low voice by his side. Wei Han’s heart knocked with a ‘thump‘. This big boy still had the same appearance and voice from his memories.
